FAQ / Starter Packs /

Metroplex Pack

  1. What battle cards are in the Metroplex Pack? (Source: Community)
    3 x Armored Plating
    3 x Backup Plan
    2 x Combat Training
    2 x Data Pad
    3 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Height Advantage
    3 x Improvised Shield
    3 x Inspiring Leadership
    3 x Protected By Metroplex
    3 x Rally the City
    3 x Rapid Conversion
    3 x Supercharge
